resources.string: SeriesGuide is built using open source software.
trakt helps keep a record of what TV shows and movies you are watching. Learn more
Get X to add more extensions
%s is already in your show list.
All shows will appear in your show list shortly.
%s will appear in your show list shortly.
Add more shows from your trakt library:
Can not create a calendar event.
Could not talk to %s. Try again later.
No app available to handle this.
To use auto backup, select valid backup files.
To use auto backup, allow access to your files.
Can\'t backup. A backup file can not be found or accessed.
Include all meta-data like descriptions, actors and ratings.
This is the legacy backup system. It will get removed with a future update. If you want to restore an old backup, now would be the time. You can then export again using the new export tool.
This will overwrite the current backup file in the backup folder!
Remove all cached images from your device
%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device.
%1$s won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Do you really want to remove %s?
SeriesGuide will now sync the shows and movies on this device with trakt. This may take some time.
Displays the next upcoming episode of your SeriesGuide shows.
To backup or restore, allow access to your files.
Your backup may be too old or empty. Note: Import pre-2.0 backups in a 1.9.x version first.
Could not remove show. Try again later.
A list with this name already exists
Tell me how to improve it?
Connect to the cloud to backup and sync your shows and movies.
To use SeriesGuide Cloud, Google Play Services are required.
Removing your account will delete all shows and movies from SeriesGuide Cloud. Make sure to remove it on other connected devices as well.
Your Google account did not check out.
Setting up SeriesGuide Cloud was not completed.
You are connected to SeriesGuide Cloud.
While SeriesGuide Cloud is connected, trakt sync will be disabled.
There is no readable backup file.
The backup file is not readable.
Can\'t restore backup. The backup folder is not available.
The current show list will be lost! Make sure the backup file is inside the backup folder.
I understand my current shows, lists and movies will be replaced!
Small library allowing you to make a smooth indeterminate progress bar. You can either user your progress bars and set this drawable or use directly the SmoothProgressBarView.
This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.
This app uses data and images by trakt.
This app uses data and images by TheTVDB licensed under CC BY-NC 4.0.
You can add shows, seasons or episodes to this list.
You have not added movies to your collection.
You have not added movies to your watchlist.
Some details are hidden to prevent spoilers. To turn this off go to Settings.
There is no description translated to %1$s available at %2$s.
Nothing going on. Watch some shows!
Nothing going on. Watch some movies!
Connect to a network, then try again.
X Pass is currently not available.
Nobody here?! Touch to try again.
Weekly backup of your shows, lists and movies
Automatically sync and update SeriesGuide data
Share ideas, discuss changes or report problems (English)
Send anonymous usage statistics to a Google service
Hide details until an episode is watched
Special episodes disappear from everywhere except season list
Do not ask for a check in message
Suggest and vote on future improvements (English)
To reduce data charges, don\'t download over mobile or metered networks
Also vibrate on displaying a notification
Try to backup in Settings, re-install and restore.
Your comment does not follow the rules!
The subscription is currently not available.
On the next screen sign into trakt or create a new account. Then allow SeriesGuide access to your trakt account.
Something went wrong. Check your trakt credentials and try again.
Not (yet) available on trakt. Try again later.
Can not (yet) be tracked with trakt.
You are already checked into another episode or movie. Either override the previous check-in or wait %s and try again.
The show does not exist (yet) on TheTVDB. Try again later.
An update is in progress, try again later.
To update connect to the internet.
Unlock all features including notifications, themes and more list widget options. Help me make future updates.
Thanks for supporting SeriesGuide! You have access to all features.
No history on trakt. Watch and check into some movies!
No history on trakt. Watch and check into some shows!
